mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dwd_industry_chain (id, industry_chain_code, industry_chain_name, industry_chain_name_pinyin, notes, former_name, icon, deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modify,create_by, update_by, data_source) VALUES
(#{do.id}, #{do.industryChainCode}, #{do.industryChainName}, #{do.industryChainNamePinyin}, #{do.notes}, #{do.formerName}, #{do.icon},#{do.deleted}, #{do.gmtCreate}, #{do.gmtModify},#{do.createBy}, #{do.updateBy}, #{do.dataSource})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE industry_chain_code = values(industry_chain_code), industry_chain_name = values(industry_chain_name), industry_chain_name_pinyin = values(industry_chain_name_pinyin), notes = values(notes), former_name = values(former_name), icon = values(icon), data_source = values(data_source), deleted = VALUES(deleted), gmt_create = VALUES(gmt_create), gmt_modify = VALUES(gmt_modify), create_by = VALUES(create_by), update_by = VALUES(update_by)
